content.question: The function f, whose graph is shown above, is defined on the interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CE0@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.
